messages.subject: Santa Will Bring a Shinsengumi Present...
messages.msgSnippet: http://news.yahoo.com/s/usatoday/20051027/en_usatoday/everybodyssamuraifighting When the Last Sword Is Drawn, the winner of last year s Japanese Academy Award
messages.messageBody:
http://news.yahoo.com/s/usatoday/20051027/en_usatoday/everybodyssamuraifighting

"When the Last Sword Is Drawn, the winner of last year's Japanese
Academy Award for best picture, arrives on DVD Dec. 27."
no company info (-_-)

the article mentions SHINOBI--the romantic ninja film starring Jo Odagiri

http://www.ninjadojo.com
has enjoyed a new wave of topics and outstanding members
look for members "michaeltr" "tsugumu" and "chiba2000"
you may also search their forums for words like Shinsengumi, When the
Last Sword was Drawn , Sword of Doom and we musn't forget the classic
GOHATTO to study their opinions

if anyone would like to contribute ideas to an article about
Shinsengumi research, web or library please email me at
secretarytocapt3(a)hotmail.com
I could really use some help...
